headline: National Law Enforcement Community Engagement Training Conference To Take Place in Chicago, June 4-8, 2025
summary: CHICAGO, May 16, 2025--The third annual Professionalizing Law Enforcement-Community Engagement Training (PLECET) Conference will gather approximately 1,000 law enforcement professionals from across the nation in Chicago. Hosted at the McCormick Place Convention Center from June 4 to June 8, 2025, the event focuses on training, networking and professional development for personnel assigned to community engagement roles within law enforcement agencies.
